rows.label: qst201906_msg0001
rows.name: *sniff* *sob* *hic*

rows.label: qst201906_msg0002
rows.name:
What is the matter,
child? Why do you cry?

rows.label: qst201906_msg0003
rows.name: *sniff* Umm...there was...

rows.label: qst201906_msg0004
rows.name:
A Nopon with black feathers... It
ran into me and knocked me over...

rows.label: qst201906_msg0005
rows.name:
And they broke my precious
clam hairclip...

rows.label: qst201906_msg0006
rows.name: *sob* *sniff*

rows.label: qst201906_msg0007
rows.name:
I got it for my birthday...
Dad said it was a rare treasure
he got from salvaging...

rows.label: qst201906_msg0008
rows.name: Grrrr! That scoundrel!

rows.label: qst201906_msg0009
rows.name:
He would make a little girl cry?
Foul beast! Lowest of the low!

rows.label: qst201906_msg0010
rows.name:
Fear not, child. We will deal
with this matter forthwith.

rows.label: qst201906_msg0011
rows.name:
And while we may not be able to
recover your precious hair ornament,
we will find you a replacement.

rows.label: qst201906_msg0012
rows.name: R-really?

rows.label: qst201906_msg0013
rows.name:
Really. Not a lie ever
escapes our lips!

rows.label: qst201906_msg0014
rows.name:
Hey, Rinne, the Nopon this girl
bumped into... It could be the
one we're after, Suisui.

rows.label: qst201906_msg0015
rows.name:
If we hurry, we might be able
to catch him for questioning.

rows.label: qst201906_msg0016
rows.name:
Enough! While we agree that one
million in gold is no small sum...

rows.label: qst201906_msg0017
rows.name:
surely you have not
forgotten our dream?

rows.label: qst201906_msg0018
rows.name:
To unite the belles of the
world under a common
flag...in our entourage.

rows.label: qst201906_msg0019
rows.name:
And together we shall hold the finest
tea parties Alst has ever known!

rows.label: qst201906_msg0020
rows.name:
Saving this girl is but another
step toward that dream!

rows.label: qst201906_msg0021
rows.name:
So it is with the greatest of
urgency that we implore you to find
this child a clam hair ornament!

rows.label: qst201906_msg0022
rows.name: That means you, Rex!

rows.label: qst201906_msg0023
rows.name: Of course it does...

rows.label: qst201906_msg0024
rows.name:
But don't worry, I think you can
pick them up on the Goldmund Flight
Deck. I'll head there right now!
